title: Clang compiler warning on v3.x with TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE()
body:
After upgrading to 3.x I get this warning that wasn't there before. It happens on clang-cl (v13) but not on MSVC. (don't have a gcc build atm to test).
According to SO this was kind of a mis-feature in the standard and is safe to ignore, and apparently it's not a thing in C++20 (I'm compiling as C++20) but clang still hasn't implemented the change: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/21266380/is-the-gnu-zero-variadic-macro-arguments-safe-to-ignore
I'm doing to do `-Wno-gnu-zero-variadic-macro-arguments` but thought I'd let you know.
```
warning : must specify at least one argument for '...' parameter of variadic macro [-Wgnu-zero-variadic-macro-arguments]
  TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE("Integral", "[SlotPool]", (std::vector<int>), (boost::container::static_vector<int, MAX>))
  ^
 \include\catch2\catch_template_test_macros.hpp(76,39): note: expanded from macro 'TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE'
      #define TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE( ... ) INTERNAL_CATCH_TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE( __VA_ARGS__ )
                                        ^
include\catch2\internal\catch_template_test_registry.hpp(103,9): note: expanded from macro 'INTERNAL_CATCH_TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE'
          INTERNAL_CATCH_TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE_2( INTERNAL_CATCH_UNIQUE_NAME( CATCH2_INTERNAL_TEMPLATE_TEST_ ), INTERNAL_CATCH_UNIQUE_NAME( CATCH2_INTERNAL_TEMPLATE_TEST_ ), Name, Tags, typename TestType, __VA_ARGS__ )
          ^
include\catch2\internal\catch_template_test_registry.hpp(81,13): note: expanded from macro 'INTERNAL_CATCH_TEMPLATE_TEST_CASE_2'
              INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_GEN(INTERNAL_CATCH_REMOVE_PARENS(Signature))\
              ^
include\catch2\internal\catch_preprocessor.hpp(217,465): note: expanded from macro 'INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_GEN'
  #define INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_GEN(...) INTERNAL_CATCH_VA_NARGS_IMPL(__VA_ARGS__, INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1(__VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1(__VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1(__VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1(__VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1(__VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1( __VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1( __VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1( __VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1( __VA_ARGS__),INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_1( __VA_ARGS__), INTERNAL_CATCH_NTTP_0)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ^
  \include\catch2\internal\catch_preprocessor.hpp(100,9): note: macro 'INTERNAL_CATCH_VA_NARGS_IMPL' defined here
  #define INTERNAL_CATCH_VA_NARGS_IMPL(_0, _1, _2, _3, _4, _5, _6, _7, _8, _9, _10, N, ...) N
```
